phrases: There is 7 billion people in this world,
whoever you can meet is destined.
And among these people, those who become your friend...
As the chances are one of 7 billion.
Indeed, it looks like a miracle.
However, though a lot of people live in this world,
As long as you live like a normal person,
it is very easy to make friends.
As long as you live like a normal person.
It is easy say, but I wonder...
You really like to act cocky, do not you?
I do not care who you are,
but there is a rule here.
You look cocky, but you are really just a coward.
Do not let him get away!
Stop right there! - Do not let him get away!
Hasegawa Kodaka, from Class 2-5, St. Chronica's Academy.
My father is Japanese, and mother was English.
Therefore, my blond hair shows that I am different than others.
We have lived many places since I was young,
we moved here to Touya City just 3 months ago.
Only my weird younger sister and I are staying together.
My servant, have you readied the sacrifice for tonight?
And I only communicate with my sister, Kobato, everyday.
I am an introvert and terrible in social situations.
Basically, I am scared of strangers and get nervous easily.
Also, my hair and my eyes look vicious.
From now on, Hasegawa Kodaka is going to be your friend.
Something also happened on the day we moved here.
there is been rumors about a violent person who moved...
So, that is what is causing everything.
You really like to act cocky, do not you?
Honestly, I am quite good in sport.
But I never fight with others.
So, what I do... is run away.
Since then, rumors about me being a
gangster have been spread out, too.
Because of my introversion, this is how others see me in school.
Well, it is very hard to live like this.
And I will be involved in it.
Anyway, that was my short introduction of myself.
That day when we went to theme park,
someone was talking with you, right, Tomo-chan?
You are just too adorable, Tomo-chan.
Oh yeah, you told me before.
I am asking you, did you see it?
I am chatting with my air friend, Tomo-chan.
Have you heard an air guitar before?
Does that mean... you imagine there is a friend?
I am so happy to chat with Tomo-chan...
And I always lose track of the time.
It is so nice to have a friend.
Beside Tomo-chan, do you have other friends?
If I had any, then I would not need Tomo-chan.
Well, are not you the lonely transfer student?
Please do not say it like that, it was 3 months ago.
I always standby for chances to talk with others,
so I have all our classmates' names in my head.
However, no one talks to me and I do not know why.
The forever-alone Kodaka has no right to criticize me.
So, now she calls me by my first name directly?
Kodaka, were you alone in your previous school, too?
I have never have friends before.
Plus I get nervous when talking to
others, so everyone gets afraid of me.
You have no right to say that, you know.
Do not compare yourself with me!
Actually, I am not really looking to make friends.
What do you mean by that?
I do not mind if have no friends,
but I hate that they treat me like some kind
of pittiful girl because I do not have friends.
I hope someday I can have a true friend.
Well, do you have any good ideas?
Maybe you can join a club?
Everyone in the club already built up their relationships,
and then you suddenly join in, it is too awkward.
You feel shy when talking to others, right?
But now you can communicate just like a normal person.
This is how we met for the first time.
Finally, you are back, my servant.
I am sorry, but she is my younger sister.
I will forgive you for now.
Come, offer your sacrifice to me!
Kobato, I am sorry for coming back late.
Kobato is just a fake name of mine.
My true name is Reists V. Felicity Sumeragi.
I am sorry, but she is my younger sister.
A junior high student at St. Chronica's Academy.
Due to the influence of Iron Necromancer,
she is always wearing such strange clothes.
Of course, she has no friends either.
And I can communicate with her without any problems.
So I wonder why I get nervous while communicating with others.
Maybe I feel nervous because they are making judgements on me.
I have no interest in your boring topic.
Fill up the Virgin Blood for me.
Finish it, if not I will never cook dinner for you.
An-chan, you are a bad guy!
Well, what is it if it is not.
This is nothing that concerns you.
I hope you can enjoy your shopping here.
Let us go to the snack counter!
Eating bento alone on the roof.
I can see how lonely you are.
Oh my, is not that Hasegawa? - Oh gosh.
Yes, with the spirit of Christianity,
we will become our school mates' friendly neighbour.
This is a club where we can learn from each other earnestly and sincerely.
So, what is function of this club?
It is to make friends, of course.
I never thought of that before.
I believe that we can find our true friends as you would said, right?
Why do you act like this has nothing
You are one of the members!
Come, let us put up these posters together.
I believe we can make this work.
This is the poster for member recruitment.
But there is no activity briefing written on it!
If someone really wants to make friends,
then he should notice this hidden message.
And how about the drawing below it?
When you get 100 friends, we will eat onigiri at Mount Fuji.
I see, you only believe in your own feelings.
Kodaka, it is hard to believe that you are one of the main stream.
That has nothing to do with this!
Well, there is something that really bothers me...
You always call me you, it is annoying and I dislike it.
Call me my first name directly.
What is with that creepy smile?
I feel awkward calling you by your first name...
But I would not tell you.
Because nicknames are only to be used by friends.
So, put these up during recess.
If I could let it be like this forever...
Sometimes I will think like that too.
Seems you had an argument with some other school students, right?
What kind of gratitude and grudges you have with others...
But, when this happen in school, it is another story.
As a student council president, I have the duty to keep our school at peace.
From now on, please report to me if you intend to do something big.
That is all I can say.
But you been there before, right?
Come on, you are free, are not you?
So, this is our club activity?
Our priority mission is to recruit members.
I think I should give up.
Wait, she is a person who wants to join our club, is not she?
What the crap are you talking about?
Tomo-chan, what a weirdo he is, right?
Hey, why did you close the door?
I am here to join the club!
Wait, why did you close the door?
Nope, but I recognize her face and know her name.
The wealthy daughter of a city council member.
Every guy loves her very much.
But she is just a spoiled little girl.
She is pretty with a nice body, good in sport as well as study.
Always gets first place in academic rankings.
Damn that bitch, I hope she dies now!
Tomo-chan, you agree with that too, right?
Why do you treat me so badly?
I said I want to join the club!
If you are here to sneer at us, please go away!
I am here because of that friend recruitment poster!
I want to make friends too!
Look at me, I am perfect in every way, right?
I am smart and good at sports.
As you see now, I am a pretty young lady.
I shall bestow you the right to complain about this kind of injustice, my plebeians.
You are just a cheap milk cow.
Kashiwazaki, you said you want to make friends, right?
But you are always surrounded by boys.
What I want is same-sex friends.
For example, when we have been assigned to form a group...
they are the friends who will form a group with me without second thought.
I see, as I know, normally popular girls will always get supplant by other girls.
You look like gangster but know quite a bit.
Let me step on you, bow now!
Or you want to lick my shoes?
Normally boys in my class will do it if I say so.
Are you intend to play in more erotic way?
I will not agree to tie you up with long stockings!
I guess this is what I can expect from the person
who can read the hidden message of that poster.
As both of you can be friends.
I see, my bad, your classes are different.
So you two cannot be together during practical class.
That is not what I mean!
Why I must be friends with this milk cow girl?
What are you saying, evil witch?
Why must you make it tough the first time you two meet?
As this bitch has terrible attitude.
Yet it is still better than someone who has a brain problem.
Excuse me, I am always the 1 in school rankings.
Yeah, well done for a little milk cow.
Damn you, I am going to tell my Papa and make him expel you!
Still calling Papa and Mama, do not you feel embarrassed?
That is why you are a milk cow.
Nope, milk cow is too easy for you.
From now on, you are Meat.
I allow you to call me that.
You can call this woman by her first name, but call my last name instead.
That shows that I am lower than her.
I see, it is my servant.
Such a thing is not something that is enjoyable.
You did not join any clubs, right?
Although someone forced me to join it.
Things like this always happen in this world.
If you are free after school, you can come and have fun with us.
That day, I had a dream.
Yozora and Sena were playing around like normal friends.
Although I know that it is impossible...
I have to take you to Nurse's Office.
Just let me lie down here, and it will be okay.
You always abuse me like I am a idiot!
But you already agreed to lend this room to us!
This is the place for me to have an afternoon nap!
Get out if you want to quarrel!
She is a school nun, also our club's staff adviser.
Because I am smart and clever, I became a teacher at such a young age.
Compared with you all, my standard is not on the same level as yours!
This woman suddenly came to my place and forced me to lend this room to her.
I disagreed, and then she slapped on my right cheek!
Later, she forced me to advise this club organization!
Let us have some potato chips and change your mood.
I want to join this club.
Okay, start with a self introduction and the purpose you join our club.
You are a girl, but why are you wearing guy's uniform?
I am Kusunoki Yukimura from Class 1-1.
So, why do you want to join our club?
I want to be Kodaka-senpa's underling.
Why would you choose this gangster?
Actually, I always get bullied by others.
Therefore, I want to be Kodaka-senpa's underling.
To learn how to become a masculine and cool guy like Kodaka-senpai.
He is just a gangster, you know?
The romantic and cool way he is living like the wind.
This is the ideal look of a Japanese guy!
He just does not have any friends.
In another words, you want to become a tough and strong guy...
The way you face the difficulty bravely with your strength,
From now on, you are going to stay along
with Kodaka and learn the way to be a man!
How can you decide this without asking him?
I will work for this seriously.
It is our loss if we do not recruit this
interesting idiot, so I want him to stay.
What a nasty girl you are.
Could you pretend nothing'd happened if he got bullied?
Can I call you big brother?
Just let me take it for myself.
You are the girl from yesterday...
I am Shiguma Rika from Class 1-3.
So Rika has to pay you back somehow.
It was just a quick-effect sleeping pill, it has no harm on human body.
In that case, I should not be a savior.
Indeed, that drug brings no harm to Rika,
but if you did not pass by there,
Rika might have fallen asleep inside the science lab forever.
And then, if some wild guy came passing by,
and found out that Rika was falling asleep,
he might do something bad while Rika lost consciousness.
This is how the story goes in Rika's favourite novels,
Guys are carnivore and they will rape Rika non-stop,
Rika has a weird feeling after imagining it.
Anyway, thanks for protecting Rika's chastity.
Rika's thinking to surrender her chastity to you.
it is Rika's first time bing interested in a mammal.
Okay, I get it but no thanks.
she would already invented many drugs and computer programs.
Currently she is a technical assistant in a company.
Yukimura, why are you dressed up like a maid?
a true man can show his manliness no matter how he dresses.
Kodaka-senpai, so you really are here!
Rika heard that senpai joined the Neighbour's Club, so she wants to join too.
This club is formed for a noble reason.
So, there is a condition to join our club.
The reason is to make friend, right?
Rika saw a poster while on the way here.
Not because Rika's a prude, but she also do not have many friends.
Besides, Rika's classmates jeer at her that she is a pervert.
Seems like you fulfill the condition.
So, we can always be together!
The relationship among the members of the Neighbour's Club is very interesting.
We will not say hi if we run across each other in the corridors.
But after school, our relationship changes into another form.
We gather in a same space, but do nothing.
And that is when I realized...
It seems we are avoiding something, thus we are gathering together.
For the moment we have friends,
let us create a relay novel today!
I heard that you would joined the Neighbour Club.
Seems there is some interesting people gathered there.
When you and those isolated people gather together,
I believe that place is your only oasis in this world.
What are you trying to say?
Nothing, I just feel pity for all of you.
Good, as long as you are happy.
I put a high hopes on you.
You just need to do what you should do.
Do not stare at me if it is nothing.
Why did you jointhe Neighbour's Club?
I said I want to make friends, did not I?
You do not have any friends?
If I really knew, then I would not feel pain now.
That fool named me a terrible nickname.
But you accepted it eventually, right?
That is because this is first time someone gave me a nickname.
Everyone, we are going to start our activity now.
Never mind, I would locked the door.
Can you listen to me a while?
Those people will go for karaoke after school.
At first, I planned to go for karaoke alone.
But I feel this is weird.
Normally, they will go there together.
we nearly have nothing in common.
This is one of the reasons that we are not part of those people.
Therefore, do you still want to go for karaoke?
Yes, let us go for karaoke together.
I do not want to go!
Come on, you are happy to come, right?
Yes, please empty this room within a week.
Well, you din't even do a proper procedure for this.
So, you still want to continue your club activity?
Have you gotten permission from Sister Maria?
Sister Maria does not have such right in hand.
According to our rules, the Neighbour's Club cannot be an official school club.
Right now, you are illegally occupying this room.
Finally, the love of a gangster and president,
the fujoshi's favourite play is here!
Please kill each other with your love!
What is the matter with her?
Rika can feel something strange when she imagines it.
So, we still can use this room until end of this week, right?
Do not mind any of this.
Where else can I play this game?
You can play it at your home.
Sena really likes to play games.
I wish I could get into the game.
I still can differentiate between reality and the virtual world.
Actually you can get into the game.
This is a video game software...
I think I have heard of it before.
HARD is produced in the Saga prefecture!
So, what is with this game?
In short, this is a machine which let us you play any Galgame in real form.
The electric current and the nerve gas from it is
main processor will make our brain feel excitement.
And then you can get into the virtual world.
First, let us install the data of this school and city inside this processor.
So our school will be the main stage,
and we can feel the excitement of making friends.
So you are not merely a pervert.
At first, Rika invented this to experience the real sex.
So you are totally a pervert.
Pervert is Rika's profession, inventing things is just her hobby.
Put on the helmet and mask.
It is once in a blue moon, so let us play it together.
As we are just testing it,
so Rika will set it into the easy mode.
You can do anything you want.
Anything in your mind, can be real!
You act like this is normal.
Next, Rika's going to take you to 17th July of virtual world.
So we are now in the game?
Everything's just like in the real world.
Seems you guys are safely logged in.
Every pain you feel in this world...
So, please be careful and do not get hurt.
So, please go to your classroom as usual.
Class is going to start soon.
Due to the development in countries like France,
the Catholic Church's power is becoming stronger.
Before the 3rd century, churches had been built
all over the Roman Empire and become stronger.
Kodaka, have you done the homework for next period?
Oh gosh, I planned to copy your homework at first.
Are you free after school today?
Kayako found a really nice cake shop!
It is a great place but not everyone knows the place.
For me, a high standard person,
this thing can be easily solved.
It is a piece of cake.
Although I made friends this way,
I still feel like I am losing to myself.
Kodaka, do you want to go for karaoke with the girls from Class 2?
Kodaka, do you want to go for karaoke with the girls from Class 2?
There is an error, Rika needs to stop this urgently.
My head's in so much pain.
Rika thinks the system is incomplete.
I will not play this any longer!
Do not you think it is fun?
That is why you are Meat.
It is dangerous to let this error happen.
Rika has to repair this system.
Maybe Rika can finish it before she graduates.
It is rare seeing you here.
This is not your special seat.
They would dismissed our Neighbour's Club, so you, too, feel lonely.
Nobody will feel sad for that club...
Hey, you are the founder, do not talk bad about your club.
I am the one who formed this club.
It is bullshit if I do not feel sad.
What are you always looking at here?
The Neighbour's Club has been dismissed.
that place was like a meeting room.
We have gone back to our daily lives.
Since then, we never talked to each other.
Building up the bravery to step out,
but none of us have such a thing.
The thing that we wanted but we still cannot get it.
It is still shining like always.
Let us have the sex that we have longing for!
Since when have we had sex before?
Rika always wears her sexy panties for you.
Take back all of your private stuff.
I heard that she is been sick for days.
Although all of her stuff is good,
but she still has not paid her club fees.
The game processor in the science lab is gone...
It is possible for Meat to do that.
Alright, we will pay her a visit.
But this is to claim back the club fees.
Damn, she is nothing but a meat.
Actually we want to meet Sena.
Thanks for coming here from afar,
We have an urgent meeting with her.
She used it until she became like this!
This fellow's brain has nothing but meat!
It will be very dangerous if we let it be.
She will never get out from the game world.
In another words, she will be paralyzed forever.
I think it is fine to let her be.
We can just pull off the switch.
If you pull off like this,
it will bring the system to reboot forcibly.
It is more safe to reset it inside the game world.
Why do I have to do this for her?
Hoping you have a pleasant day here and happy shopping.
This is so amazing no matter when we come in here.
As it is exactly same as Touya City.
Big brother, do you heard something?
We are here to take you back.
Do you feel happy in this virtual world?
I do not think we will stop here, Meat.
I will not let you in my way.
I do not care her anymore.
Why we have to suffer because of her?
We are just here to claim back club fees.
Well, let us go back now.
We will think of another way later.
I already took this back home.
I already got bored of it.
The shop lady who always ignores me talked to me just now.
Maybe she is happy to talk to you.
Big brother, I have something to discuss with you.
I went back home just like usual after the Neighbour Club's activity.
I saw a stranger was staying in my house once I stepped in.
I am not mature enough, I cannot understand this.
So I thought, maybe Big brother will know a way to solve this.
Are you sure that it is your house?
That is the place where I grew up, yet my parents were not there, either.
I do not even know that Sato family who staying in my house!
Could your family is in some sort of trouble?
I tried to figure it out,
so I tried to seek help from police, but the officer said that is Sato's house.
So I am here to discuss it with Big brother.
Oh yeah, how do you know my house?
As I would stalked you many times.
You will just stay in my place for tonight.
I am your god, your master.
I am your god, your master.
When you make an offer to your master,
please offer in the way I allow.
do not eat it on that day or the next day.
Now we are going announce the result for student council president election.
Please gather in the main hall.
Our new student council president is our top student, Kashiwazaki Sena!
As a student council president, I will do my very best!
Something serious is going to happen.
The imagination is starting to erode our daily life.
Sena's reality and virtual world have been mixed together.
Let us go back to the original world.
How can we end this absurd thing?
Destroy the software and reboot it forcibly.
It should be able to bring us back to normal world.
So, this is one big bet.
We have to find the software now.
The police cannot do anything about this.
We will go there together tomorrow.
I said this is my house!
I said this is my house!
This old man is talking nonsense!
You are talking nonsense, old man!
What are you doing in my house?
I told you this has always been my house!
And I am not an old man!
So, you are also facing the same problem.
While on the way home, I saw Maria was wandering at main gate.
Finally, the moment where we have no room to advance or to retreat is here.
It is so quiet out there.
She is the one who imagined this game.
What a terrible mine she has.
Red Team is very fast, very fast.
If she is here, what are you going to do?
And then end this ridiculous world.
Miss Sena wants to stay in this world.
The Neighbour's Club members were here.
And they want to take you back.
What is wrong with that sight?
I have high hope on you.
You just need to do what you should do.
I do not want to go back to the original world!
but our club room is here.
We got lots of food from the store.
That is enough for us for now.
I will not stay here forever.
What is situation on the east side of the town?
That Meat is doing something bad.
What should we do, if this does not improve?
But we at least need a back-up plan.
You do not want to leave this world?
Kobato and Maria are still asleep?
I think they must be too tired.
We have to think of a way out.
Do you want to go back?
This has nothing to do with that.
I had seen you get bullied many times.
Why do not you fight back?
One day I will have revenge.
Big brother, will you fight back?
Sorry, I am not only immature, but also pessimistic.
Big brother, when you see I get bullied by others,
you will not come and save me, right?
What will we do if this world continues becoming like this?
Actually you already have the answer.
I do not think this is too bad.
You really have not changed at all.
Tomorrow I am going to invade the school.
No matter what you think, I am going to end this boring world anyway.
They say they do not need me anymore.
I have been waiting for you.
You can stay in this world with everything you have now.
that is why you cannot survive in reality.
So, this is your world, Yozora.
So that you will not get hurt.
Big brother, I am so sleepy.
and her wish is getting stronger, we will be trapped here.
Which means, we will be trapped inside this world forever.
We will fall asleep like Yukimura and the others until our life ends.
Why are we inside Yozora's world?
Maybe that is the software is over there.
Rika's going up to the roof.
Senpai, please go and find Yozora-senpai.
Anything I can help you with?
I want to take Yozora back.
Without Yozora, this world will be ended too.
Do not force yourself, just stay in this world, okay?
I will not let you interfere with us!
This is the world which Yozora desires.
I wonder how many floors to go?
Hey, it is a waste to call you milk cow.
From now on, you are Meat.
Why you do not fight back?
Do not want to hurt others?
No, I do not think so.
You just do not want to hurt yourself.
They are living according to their heart,
with no lies and no camouflage.
What is wrong is your glare and your appearance!
I am the person so misunderstood!
How well do you know this?
Of course I do, as I am part of this world.
Not even able to save your friend, are you even a man?
My name is Kodaka, you can call me Taka.
It is useless, she will never wake.
She chose to stay in this world...
I imagine there is something there, and I feel happy.
I will never forget you even when I transfer to another school.
Next time when we meet, I will become stronger.
Next time I will protect you.
No, if I am not able to protect my friend, then I am not a man.
It is okay, I will stay here.
I do not want to feel disappointed again.
It is useless, when thing becomes like this.
I am sorry, I did not keep our promise.
You really did not change at all.
Whether it is 10 years ago or right now, you cannot protect anyone.
I have words for stupid Yozora.
How long are you are going to sleep?
I will forgive you due to our relationship.
But it is another story, if you are not here.
If you are not here, who else will call me Meat?
As this is the first time someone gave me a nickname.
Honestly, I hate you the most!
You have a bad personality and hanging eyes!
You have a flat chest and you are bad at singing!
I will not be defeated by you!
The song that you sang during karaoke, I can sing that better than you.
There is 7 billion people in this world,
and whoever you can meet is destined.
And among these people, those who become your friend...
As the chances are one of 7 billion.
This world is going to end.
Of course you are safe now.
Since Rika could not reset it, she used this to smash the software.
Neither of them took part in this.
Rika, how many times have we played this game today?
Of course today is the first time.
Which means, we were playing that game...
Even after it ended the first time.
But Kobato and Maria were there too.
In another words, that world is someone is dream world.
There is 7 billion people in this world,
and whoever you can meet is destined.
And among these people, those who can be your friend...
I thought I had dismissed your club!
As the chances are one of 7 billion.
I do not have many friends.
